name: Landmine Larry
description: Landmine Larry is the challenge you've been waiting for. Clear through crazy levels with twists that make you watch your footing... Landmines, TNT and more!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or AMD Phenom™ X3 or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: Intel® i5 Series Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
